thread.title: Arsenal: Serge Gnabry proves he's still a Gooner on Instagram ahead of Bayern Munich clash | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal: Serge Gnabry proves he's still a Gooner on Instagram ahead of Bayern Munich clash | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal: Serge Gnabry proves he's still a Gooner on Instagram ahead of Bayern Munich clash | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news metro sport reporter for metro.co.uk

text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 5:36 pm Serge Gnabry still has a place for Arsenal in his heart (Picture: Getty) 
He may have left the Emirates in the summer but Serge Gnabry clearly still has a soft spot for old club Arsenal. 
The German’s flourished at Werder Bremen since sealing a £5million exit, scoring seven goals in 17 appearances this term. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Arsene Wenger had high hopes for the 21-year-old at the Emirates but couldn’t stand in his way when Gnabry asked to leave in the search of first team football. 
However, the German’s shown he still has a place for the Gunners in his heart by liking one of the club’s Instagram posts today. 
The Gunners face Bayern Munich at the Allianz Arena and sent out a post saying: ‘It’s almost time – let’s do this, Gunners’.
